content: Total bull 30sec then cool down period never heard so much bull in my life wasn't like it before sort your crappie app out ...IT WASN'T LIKE IT BEFORE AT ALL SO IF A CRIME HAPPENS I CAN ONLY WATCH 30SECS THE REST THEY GET AWAY LOL SORT IT OUT

We're absolutely loving this app! It is so much better than the other Hubble for Motorola Monitors, which wehad so much trouble with. The streaming quality is improved and all of the features work.... this is our second attempt at a Motorola monitoring system, as our last one didn't even work past setup. With the Hubble Connected app, both parents can log in under the same username and password, with no issues whatsoever! We love the lullabies, too! The 1st one knocks her out always! Temp/motion

We use this camera for my grandmother whom I take care of with dementia. this camera allows me to keep chwck on her while still being able to do everything else I need to at home. I have had it for about 2 weeks now and we absolutely love it. I will highly recommend this camera system to someone else
Love it
Ok hi, now all of a sudden the Hubble app logs me out every single time I exit out of the monitoring screen. Why??

Live video feed looks sharp on phone but recorded video leaves bit to be desired. Also, only able to access 20 second clips per motion detection alert but would be nice if you could customize the time that recording runs.
this has been such a blessing to me and my baby
It keeps messing. It need to b fix
I haven't been able to access a live feed from my camera in at least 3 days. It randomly has errors and can't connect the live feed freezes. The app is not reliable at all
To log in is like trying to get into Fort Knocks
After 2 months doesn't connect to camera
Great little camera set up! Works for our nursery. Wish we could have another camera for another area.
I just purchased this Hubble baby monitor and its great I love how the picture is so clear and the audio is great I'm one happy customer. Thank you Hubble for making my life much easier.
Excellent
Monitoring wife who I'd bed fast
Very useful, tracks babies growth..her sleep and feeding are the ones I use the most and it's super simple as the widgets there just click of a button and notifies reminders
The app keeps freezing. Now it logged me out and won't let me log back in. Sound is also always cutting in and out.

It worked extremely good while in the trial period. But then they try to charge my $149.99. They couldnt get that so they went down to $79.99 and got that. But turned my cloud off and i cant getcin touch with support.

My daughter is pregnant with her first child and my first grandchild 😁 and when I purchased the Roo when she was 30 weeks it took us a little bit to find the heart beat but the further along she gets the the easier it is. She is 39 weeks now and everytime she uses the Roo she gets the heart beat almost instantly so we love it.
It wasnt compatable and kept disconnecting
Always says im offline on my phone. And there is no other option to connect it even though your phone is connected to the internet. Very frustrating

My wife is 25 weeks pregnant and we have been using the Roo Prenatal Heart Monitor since she was in her first trimester. We trusted that Roo was capturing the baby's heartbeat, however during a doctor's visit they could not pick up his palpitations and the doctor mentioned that it possibly happened within a week prior to the appointment. The Roo device could not be trusted with something SO important as our baby's health and I will NEVER recommend this.

Always an error message that reads, " can't connect to camera something went wrong. Refresh and try again". I had emailed them and each time they are working on the problem. Not worth to pay for an upgrade

In the early trimesters it was difficult to consistently find a heartbeat, which made me skeptical about the device and app, however after the 3rd trimester started I noticed it was much easier. I really appreciate that I can save recordings of baby's heartbeat and track trends, water intake and movements. Overall I'm glad I made this purchase and am happy with the app.
Crashes, doesn't load frequently and is way less reliable than the other Hubble app. Other one works fine. A baby monitor is not something you want to have technical difficulties with.
Perfect. I recommend
Not sure didn't use it. Wrong app.
I love it
The camera keeps going offline
Sucks had it for 2 days and constantly goes out and needs rebooted very unreliable system save tour money

I bought a Roo and started using this app during my pregnancy. I now use this app almost daily. It is really awesome! Way more helpful and informative that I thought it would be. I love the weekly updates and what to expect this week. Very well laid out, great articles,
Love the app. One thing could be simplified is the clock feature for the sleep. It is tedious to define start and end times.
Got this for my Mother, it allowed me to go to work and have peace of mind as I can watch and she when she wakes up. It was been a true blessing from God. I highly recommend it. No issues, none!
Been using the App for a full day and it runs wonderfully, except that it crashes every time I attempt to use the microphone. Should be able to fix by pushing an app update.
Need work
Great live video streaming quality!
Wyze app is free and the cameras are 20 bucks at home depot no monthly any ????

Was working great for a few weeks and now I can't connect at all. Error states it's on Motorola's end. Dealing with the app issues is crazy for the price of the camera. The update before last was fine. Worked great. Since the latest update its back to playing for a little bit then buffering. Back and forth. Error connect messages again. Definitely not my network as I can stream anything else, 24 hours a day with no issues.
Met all of our expectations and more!!! The monitor is super clear and has so much more to offer.
Love!!
Good
Never loads, I can't see my baby when I need to or when I get alerts.

Horrible app. Can't get past the verification process. I keep entering the pass code sent to me but it says its not valid. Tried resending OTP and it keeps saying error try agian later. Frustrating as this is to connect to my baby monitors. If I would have known I wouldn't have gotten a Motorola. Disappointed in the hubble app. Would not recommend. Stay clear
Good streaming video. Can watch it anywhere
Keeps going out, always an error ,most of time offline, its frustrating

Quite disappointed with Hubble Motorola been a customer of theirs for years and when I email them I don't get decent respond but always the same repetition email as if I don't know what I'm doing. Keep repeating myself that the menu has changed and I'm unable to connect two cameras Every year I sign a contract with them for motion detection and now that I can't get refund, because they change there menu. They are giving me the run around, the all I am requesting is a refund for half year.
Super convenient. It makes getting things done easier. Gives peace of mind for keeping an eye on baby from another room.
I like the app, I can watch from any where there is cell reception.
Was good
Works great for me! I atarted using it at 17 weeks gestation and could hear hb perfectly. Make sure you drink plenty water and eat.

I currently have several Hubble cameras. My latest purchase of the LUXE65 set has been worth the while. Vivid video. There have been a few app bugs here and there but they're generally very responsive to any submitted tickets of concerns. If you have issues I highly recommend putting in a ticket. Overall I'm very happy with any camera I've purchased from them. Some have better features than others available in the app depending on the model. I highly recommend the wifi capable Hubble cameras.

I bought this camera for my toddler to keep an eye on her from the other room (when a toddler is quiet, it's usually not a good thing lol). I really wish I had something like this when she was a newborn!! The camera and monitor are awesome (brand is Motorola) and it's awesome that I can hear her and I can speak to her from the monitor if I need to. My only complaint is that my settings somehow getting changed around without me doing anything to it (no one else has access to this but me).

Useless...I had trouble with the previous version of the app and this is worse. Main camera won't connect, tech support is hard to get a hold of, 2nd camera says it needs a firmware upgrade which keeps failing every time I try. The whole thing is garbage...I love the cameras and my monitor but I picked it for the app capability so I'm sorely disappointed.

Avoid this app like cancer. Absolutely incapable of performing the most basic functions. Buttons don't work. Random crashes. This app absolutely sucks. Also tried the iOS version. Same issues. Also the email unsubscribe link doesn't work for some reason. Shady practice, terrible app.

It works fine! I couldn't help but laugh a little at the reviewers that said it doesn't work and they tried day after day yet heard nothing. It's not a medical grade device people! You have to be patient! Maybe press down firmer as well as not at all, move Roo around by millimeters, and just wait! I don't even use the belt. Don't believe whomever said they held Roo in the air and heard galloping sounds because that wouldn't happen. Whooshing noises, but not a galloping horse. 🤷‍♀️

I love this app and product 😍. I purchased at around 20 weeks and found it difficult to locate the heartbeat, which was disappointing. Now I am in my third trimester and it's super easy to use and makes this journey a whole lot easier. I love hearing my sweet baby and being able to conveniently share this experience with my family and friends.

I wish I could rate no stars because I been trying day after day to get a heart beat but it only shows a detected rate no sound what so ever and I also held it out in the air and it made a noise like a galloping horse kinda like a heart beat but why would it only do that in the air and for the price you would think that youd be able to hear the babies heart beat loud and clear but nothing I should've read the reviews first because most said that it doesnt work and waste of money do not buy this
I love this app it's super helpful with information. Except I haven't barely been able to hear my babies heartbeat I think it's because I'm not far enough along.
Does not work.
Love it
It is fine for me
Great. Got to hear the baby's heart beat at 17 weeks.
Roo is so cute! I love to hear my baby's heartbeat!!!!
Great app. Hearing my little girl's heartbeat is an amazing feeling
I love this app I love hearing my baby's heart beat ❤️
Love this app, and the roo is so cute! Started using it at 14 weeks, takes patience and practice. But a lovely tool for moms and dads to be
Hate it because I can not get it to work with my scout 1.1
I love to hear my baby's heartbeat and movement! This is awesome!
They don't work and can't hear anything.

Certain features crash the app, tools and other selections. Also has my week count incorrect. I had to disconnect the device 3 times to get anywhere close to my week count and it's still incorrect, I just gave up on that aspect.
When I used the old apk it sent me a screen grab this apk does send a notification but no image just the hubble logo the old apk isn't being supported anymore so is there a fix for this cheers.
very useful
